participant_1.name: Laura
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and energetic, Laura loves to engage with others and shares her passions.
participant_1.background: my family is continuously growing. i'm married to a doctor. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Jake finds joy in both sports and the arts.
participant_2.background: i played football for a division a college. i am a huge star wars fan. i enjoy poetry. i try various coffees as a hobby.
